Title: Exports from Russia’s small-scale Portovaya LNG plant stall, “shutdown imminent”: Kpler Insight
Description: Kpler's data shows that in January, shipments from Gazprom’s small-scale 1.5 mtpa Portovaya and 0.7 mtpa Vysotsk LNG plants on the Baltic coast stalled following the facilities’ inclusion in the US’s latest list of sanctioned entities, which Kpler Insight suggests will lead to the facilities’ permanent shutdown.
Author: JS
